dict.string: Osaurus plugins may use automation to control other applications on your behalf.
Osaurus plugins may access your calendar to read and create events.
Osaurus plugins may access your calendar to read and create events.
Osaurus plugins may access your contacts to search and read contact information.
Osaurus plugins may access your reminders to read and create tasks.
Osaurus plugins may access your location to provide location-based services.
Osaurus plugins may access your location to provide location-based services.
Osaurus uses the microphone for on-device voice transcription with FluidAudio.
Osaurus can capture system audio for transcription. Screen content is not recorded.
